newCollectionDescription:
A special collection for the Referendum 206 collaboration items with Mushroomtopia.

The main collection can be found [here](https://singular.app/collections/3208723ec6f65df810-ITEM).

default.text:
'Brightberry'

In Referendum 206 the community voted on whether to upgrade the Kusama runtime to version 0.9.23.

This NFT can be equipped onto both the [Shelf](https://singular.app/collections/3208723ec6f65df810-SHELF) and [Mirrors of Mushroom Topia](https://singular.app/collections/c8d5ea648c93514667-MTPIAMRRS).

Artist: Ruben Topia
